column5: Anyone know what gas is per liter right now in Ignace and Thunder Bay?
Thanks for the link...according to that map the price per gallon in Ignace is right around $5.48/gallon. Huuuurrrrrrrrrrray!!!!
Two weeks ago it was around 1.40 per liter in Ignace. Great Hot Beef sandwich at the truck stop there.

i live in thunder bay. the price today is 138 to 142 per litre. there are 4.5 litres in an imperial gallon. if you venture to the mount mackay indian reserve and go to the gas bars closer to the mountain,the gas goes for 125. there are several gas stations on the reserve. as i say,the first couple are expensive. but travel further, about a half mile and gas gets cheaper.
3.785 liters to US gallon, approx. 5.30 us for a gallon in Canada.
